my problem is that i cannot connect to server

Signlink: public void run() { uid = 123456; active = true; String s = findcachedir(); uid = getuid(s); try {

RS2LoginProtocolDecoder: int uid = in.getInt(); if(uid == 0 || uid == 123456) { session.close(); return false; }

Client.java (Client): stream.currentOffset = 0; stream.writeWordBigEndian(10); stream.writeDWord(ai[0]); stream.writeDWord(ai[1]); stream.writeDWord(ai[2]); stream.writeDWord(ai[3]); stream.writeDWord(signlink.uid); stream.writeString(s); stream.writeString(s1); stream.doKeys();
